content: I cleaned the warnings... why is the Resource still stuck at 0? It is approved and indicated in the xml as 2...

FMM levels are set in FHIR.ini. You can update them there. (Also, make sure the FMM spreadsheet is up-to-date because during the QA period, we'll be replacing the FMM levels in the FHIR.ini with those determined by the spreadsheet.)
